attributes.additional_details: Over the decades British Citizens have suffered in all aspects of their lives due to the immigration laws of this country i:e Employment, Housing, Hospital waiting list, welfare bills. Crime, Terrorism and more all because of European Laws, Its about time that the UK government (who every they are) should grow a backbone and stand up to Europe and put the British Citizens first and before 2014 when two more Countries come here to take up more resourses.
